mapper.select: SELECT T_ID AS ID, T_NICKNAME AS NICK, T_CURRENT_CAPA AS CNT, T_MAX AS MAX FROM PG_TRACK ORDER BY T_ID
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PG_RFID_GENERAL WHERE IN_TIME IS NOT NULL AND (OUT_TIME IS NULL OR OUT_TIME='') AND TC_DAY=#{tcDay}
SELECT CONCAT_WS('#div#', D_NAME, IFNULL(RM_W_CH, '이등록')) AS D_NAME FROM PG_RESOURCE_MAPPING WHERE TC_SEQ=#{tcSeq} AND TC_DAY=#{tcDay} AND R_ID=#{tagId}

SELECT CONCAT_WS('#div#', IFNULL(C_VENDER, VHCL_MAKER), IFNULL(C_NAME, VHCL_NAME), IFNULL(C_COLOR, VHCL_CLR), IFNULL(C_TYPE, 'N')) FROM PG_RESOURCE_MAPPING PRM LEFT OUTER JOIN PG_CAR PC ON PRM.C_CODE = PC.C_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN PG_HINT_CAR PHC ON PRM.C_CODE = PHC.VHCL_CODE WHERE PRM.TC_SEQ=#{tcSeq} AND PRM.TC_DAY=#{tcDay} AND R_ID=#{carTagId}

SELECT TC_RESERV_CODE, GROUP_CONCAT(TR_TRACK_NICKNAME SEPARATOR ' ') TR_NAME, COMP_NAME, D_NAME, D_LEVEL, W_CH, IFNULL(C_VENDER, VHCL_MAKER) AS C_VENDER, IFNULL(C_NAME, VHCL_NAME) AS C_NAME, IFNULL(C_NUMBER, VHCL_RGSNO) AS C_NUMBER, IFNULL(C_COLOR, VHCL_CLR) AS C_COLOR, IFNULL(C_TYPE, 'N') FROM PG_RFID_GENERAL PRG INNER JOIN PG_TRACK_RESERV PTR ON PRG.TC_RESERV_CODE = PTR.TC_REQUEST_NUMBER LEFT OUTER JOIN PG_CAR PC ON PRG.C_CODE = PC.C_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN PG_HINT_CAR PHC ON PRG.C_CODE = PHC.VHCL_CODE WHERE PTR.TC_DAY=#{tcDay} AND IN_TIME IS NOT NULL AND OUT_TIME IS NULL ORDER BY PRG_NO DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE PG_RFID_GENERAL SET IN_TIME = #{currentTime} WHERE IN_TIME IS NULL OR IN_TIME = '' ORDER BY PRG_NO DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.select: SELECT TC_RESERV_CODE, IN_TIME, OUT_TIME, COMP_NAME, 'GNR' AS T_NICKNAME, D_NAME, D_LEVEL, W_CH, IFNULL(C_VENDER, VHCL_MAKER) AS C_VENDER, IFNULL(C_NAME, VHCL_NAME) AS C_NAME, IFNULL(C_NUMBER, VHCL_RGSNO) AS C_NUMBER, IFNULL(C_COLOR, VHCL_CLR) AS C_COLOR, IFNULL(C_TYPE, 'N') FROM PG_RFID_GENERAL PRG LEFT OUTER JOIN PG_CAR PC ON PRG.C_CODE = PC.C_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN PG_HINT_CAR PHC ON PRG.C_CODE = PHC.VHCL_CODE WHERE D_NAME=#{dName} AND PRG.TC_DAY=#{tcDay} ORDER BY PRG_NO DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT IFNULL(C_VENDER, VHCL_MAKER) AS C_VENDER, IFNULL(C_NAME, VHCL_NAME) AS C_NAME, IFNULL(C_NUMBER, VHCL_RGSNO) AS C_NUMBER, IFNULL(C_COLOR, VHCL_CLR) AS C_COLOR, IFNULL(C_TYPE, 'N') FROM PG_RESOURCE_MAPPING PRM LEFT OUTER JOIN PG_CAR PC ON PRM.C_CODE = PC.C_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN PG_HINT_CAR PHC ON PRM.C_CODE = PHC.VHCL_CODE WHERE PRM.TC_SEQ=#{tcSeq} AND R_ID=#{carTagId} AND PRM.TC_DAY=#{tcDay}
